org.elasticsearch.index.mapper

Interface FieldMapper<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Mapper, ToXContent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFieldMapper, AllFieldMapper, BinaryFieldMapper, BooleanFieldMapper, BoostFieldMapper, ByteFieldMapper, CompletionFieldMapper, DateFieldMapper, DoubleFieldMapper, FieldNamesFieldMapper, FloatFieldMapper, GeoPointFieldMapper, GeoShapeFieldMapper, IdFieldMapper, IndexFieldMapper, IntegerFieldMapper, IpFieldMapper, LongFieldMapper, Murmur3FieldMapper, NumberFieldMapper, ParentFieldMapper, RoutingFieldMapper, ShortFieldMapper, SizeFieldMapper, SourceFieldMapper, StringFieldMapper, TimestampFieldMapper, TokenCountFieldMapper, TTLFieldMapper, TypeFieldMapper, UidFieldMapper, VersionFieldMapper

extends Mapper

      • isGenerated

        boolean isGenerated()
        Fields might not be available before indexing, for example _all, token_count,... When get is called and these fields are requested, this case needs special treatment.
        Returns:
        If the field is available before indexing or not.
